description: Structured scorecard for analyzing Pennie sales call transcripts with focus on compliance adherence and customer experience quality

pennie_agent_speaker.description: Speaker identifier for the Pennie sales representative
pennie_agent_speaker.title: Pennie Agent Speaker

other_speakers.description: List of other speakers in the call
other_speakers.title: Other Speakers

call_topic.description: Main topic or subject of the call
call_topic.title: Call Topic

call_purpose.description: Primary purpose or objective of the call
call_purpose.title: Call Purpose

call_outcome.description: Result or outcome of the call
call_outcome.title: Call Outcome

overall_tone.description: General tone and atmosphere of the conversation
overall_tone.title: Overall Tone

manager_review_required.description: Boolean flag - only true for multiple compliance violations (2+) OR blatant negative customer treatment
manager_review_required.title: Manager Review Required

manager_review_reason.description: Specific reason why manager review is required - empty string if not required
manager_review_reason.title: Manager Review Reason

manager_focus_areas.description: Structured evidence entries the manager should review
manager_focus_areas.title: Manager Focus Areas

speaker.description: Speaker label (e.g., Agent, Customer, Transfer Agent)
speaker.title: Speaker

quote.description: Direct quote captured verbatim where possible
quote.title: Quote

context.description: Contextual description of when the quote occurred
context.title: Context

process_step.description: Pennie 6-step tag representing where the interaction occurred
process_step.title: Process Step

agent_identification.description: Did the agent clearly identify themselves as a Pennie representative?
agent_identification.title: Agent Identification

agent_identification_evidence.description: Evidence entries showing where agent identification occurred; return an empty array if not observed or not applicable
agent_identification_evidence.title: Agent Identification Evidence

speaker.description: Speaker label (e.g., Agent, Customer, Transfer Agent)
speaker.title: Speaker

quote.description: Direct quote captured verbatim where possible
quote.title: Quote

context.description: Contextual description of when the quote occurred
context.title: Context

process_step.description: Pennie 6-step tag representing where the interaction occurred
process_step.title: Process Step

call_recording_disclosure.description: Did the agent disclose that the call is being recorded?
call_recording_disclosure.title: Call Recording Disclosure

call_recording_disclosure_evidence.description: Evidence entries showing the call recording disclosure; return an empty array if not observed or not applicable
call_recording_disclosure_evidence.title: Call Recording Disclosure Evidence

speaker.description: Speaker label (e.g., Agent, Customer, Transfer Agent)
speaker.title: Speaker

quote.description: Direct quote captured verbatim where possible
quote.title: Quote

context.description: Contextual description of when the quote occurred
context.title: Context

process_step.description: Pennie 6-step tag representing where the interaction occurred
process_step.title: Process Step

credit_pull_consent.description: Did the agent obtain explicit verbal consent before pulling credit?
credit_pull_consent.title: Credit Pull Consent

credit_pull_consent_evidence.description: Evidence entries showing the credit pull consent; return an empty array if not observed or not applicable
credit_pull_consent_evidence.title: Credit Pull Consent Evidence

speaker.description: Speaker label (e.g., Agent, Customer, Transfer Agent)
speaker.title: Speaker

quote.description: Direct quote captured verbatim where possible
quote.title: Quote

context.description: Contextual description of when the quote occurred
context.title: Context

process_step.description: Pennie 6-step tag representing where the interaction occurred
process_step.title: Process Step

social_security_verification.description: Did the agent properly request and verify SSN for security purposes?
social_security_verification.title: Social Security Verification

social_security_verification_evidence.description: Evidence entries showing SSN verification; return an empty array if not observed or not applicable
social_security_verification_evidence.title: Social Security Verification Evidence

speaker.description: Speaker label (e.g., Agent, Customer, Transfer Agent)
speaker.title: Speaker

quote.description: Direct quote captured verbatim where possible
quote.title: Quote

context.description: Contextual description of when the quote occurred
context.title: Context

process_step.description: Pennie 6-step tag representing where the interaction occurred
process_step.title: Process Step

accurate_representations.description: Did the agent make only truthful statements about Pennie's services?
accurate_representations.title: Accurate Representations

accurate_representations_violations.description: Quotes or descriptions of inaccurate representations made
accurate_representations_violations.title: Accurate Representations Violations

critical_red_flag_hits.description: Critical red flags detected during the call with supporting evidence
critical_red_flag_hits.title: Critical Red Flag Hits

red_flag.description: Category of the red flag triggered
red_flag.title: Red Flag Category

evidence.description: Structured evidence supporting the identified red flag; return an empty array if no direct quote is available
evidence.title: Red Flag Evidence

speaker.description: Speaker label (e.g., Agent, Customer, Transfer Agent)
speaker.title: Speaker

quote.description: Direct quote captured verbatim where possible
quote.title: Quote

context.description: Contextual description of when the quote occurred
context.title: Context

process_step.description: Pennie 6-step tag representing where the interaction occurred
process_step.title: Process Step

no_misleading_claims.description: Did the agent avoid making unrealistic promises about outcomes?
no_misleading_claims.title: No Misleading Claims

misleading_claims_violations.description: Quotes or descriptions of misleading claims made
misleading_claims_violations.title: Misleading Claims Violations

overall_compliance_score.description: Overall compliance assessment - fails if any individual item fails
overall_compliance_score.title: Overall Compliance Score

compliance_violations.description: List of specific compliance violations with supporting quotes
compliance_violations.title: Compliance Violations

critical_moments.description: Quotes or descriptions of critical compliance moments requiring attention
critical_moments.title: Critical Moments

professional_tone.description: Was the agent respectful, courteous, and professional?
professional_tone.title: Professional Tone

professional_tone_examples.description: Quotes or contextual descriptions demonstrating tone quality
professional_tone_examples.title: Professional Tone Examples

active_listening.description: Did the agent demonstrate active listening and respond appropriately?
active_listening.title: Active Listening

active_listening_examples.description: Quotes showing active listening or lack thereof
active_listening_examples.title: Active Listening Examples

patience_empathy.description: Did the agent show patience and empathy with financial difficulties?
patience_empathy.title: Patience and Empathy

patience_empathy_examples.description: Quotes demonstrating patience and empathy levels
patience_empathy_examples.title: Patience and Empathy Examples

clear_communication.description: Did the agent explain concepts clearly without confusing jargon?
clear_communication.title: Clear Communication

customer_focused.description: Did the agent prioritize customer's best interests over sales pressure?
customer_focused.title: Customer Focused

customer_focused_examples.description: Quotes showing customer focus or lack thereof
customer_focused_examples.title: Customer Focused Examples

overall_customer_experience.description: Overall assessment of customer experience quality
overall_customer_experience.title: Overall Customer Experience

customer_experience_notes.description: Additional notes about customer experience and interaction quality
customer_experience_notes.title: Customer Experience Notes

notable_interactions.description: Quotes or descriptions of key positive/negative interactions
notable_interactions.title: Notable Interactions

expected_sections.description: Pennie playbook sections that were expected to be covered based on call context
expected_sections.title: Expected Sections

sections_attempted.description: Pennie playbook sections that were attempted during the call
sections_attempted.title: Sections Attempted

sections_completed.description: Pennie playbook sections that were fully completed during the call
sections_completed.title: Sections Completed

step1_agenda_setting.description: Agenda setting and credit pull authorization step completion
step1_agenda_setting.title: Step 1: Agenda Setting

step1_location.description: Quote or context describing where Step 1 occurred, null if missing
step1_location.title: Step 1 Location

step2_credit_review.description: Credit report review and trend analysis step completion
step2_credit_review.title: Step 2: Credit Review

step2_location.description: Quote or context describing where Step 2 occurred, null if missing or not applicable
step2_location.title: Step 2 Location

step3_agent_inputs.description: Agent inputs and DTI calculation step completion
step3_agent_inputs.title: Step 3: Agent Inputs

step3_location.description: Quote or context describing where Step 3 occurred, null if missing
step3_location.title: Step 3 Location

step4_paydown_projections.description: Paydown projections and creditworthiness timeline step completion
step4_paydown_projections.title: Step 4: Paydown Projections

step4_location.description: Quote or context describing where Step 4 occurred, null if missing or not applicable
step4_location.title: Step 4 Location

step5_location.description: Quote or context describing where Step 5 occurred, null if missing or not applicable
step5_location.title: Step 5 Location

step6_location.description: Quote or context describing where Step 6 occurred, null if missing or not applicable
step6_location.title: Step 6 Location

overall_process_adherence.description: Overall adherence to Pennie's sales methodology
overall_process_adherence.title: Overall Process Adherence

missed_opportunities.description: Descriptions of missed opportunities with context
missed_opportunities.title: Missed Opportunities

process_notes.description: Additional notes about sales process execution
process_notes.title: Process Notes

section_gap_reasons.description: Reasons expected sections were not completed
section_gap_reasons.title: Section Gap Reasons

section.description: Pennie playbook section number that was not completed
section.title: Section

reason.description: Reason the section was not completed (e.g., call ended early, customer declined, agent skipped)
reason.title: Reason

key_process_moments.description: Quotes or descriptions of important process milestones
key_process_moments.title: Key Process Moments

transfer_occurred.description: Boolean indicating if call was transferred to another agent
transfer_occurred.title: Transfer Occurred

transfer_agent_tone.description: Assessment of transfer agent's tone and professionalism
transfer_agent_tone.title: Transfer Agent Tone

transfer_quality.description: Overall assessment of transfer agent quality or 'not_applicable'
transfer_quality.title: Transfer Quality

training_recommendations.description: Recommended training modules or focus areas
training_recommendations.title: Training Recommendations

sales_effectiveness.description: Assessment of sales effectiveness and methodology execution
sales_effectiveness.title: Sales Effectiveness

customer_satisfaction_likely.description: Predicted customer satisfaction level based on interaction
customer_satisfaction_likely.title: Customer Satisfaction Likely

overall_score.description: Overall call score combining all assessment areas
overall_score.title: Overall Score
